## Properties

| Property                         | Attribute             | Description                                                                                                                                      | Type     | Default     |
| -------------------------------- | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `currentIndex`                   | `current-index`       | Defines the currently active step                                                                                                                | `number` | `-1`        |
| `textCompletedStep` _(required)_ | `text-completed-step` | "Completed step" label for accessibility                                                                                                         | `string` | `undefined` |
| `textCurrentStep` _(required)_   | `text-current-step`   | "Current step" label for accessibility                                                                                                           | `string` | `undefined` |
| `textStepNumber` _(required)_    | `text-step-number`    | Label for the "Step N:" indicator for mobile view. Use `#number` as a placeholder â€” it will be replaced with the current step number at runtime. | `string` | `undefined` |
